description: This header file defines the interface for managing initial resource values for devices and endpoints within a system. It includes function declarations for creating, destroying, setting, and retrieving resource values, as well as checking their existence and logging all set values.

methods.name: initialResourceValuesCreate
methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of icInitialResourceValues.

methods.name: initialResourceValuesPutDeviceValue
methods.description: Stores or replaces an initial value for a device resource identified by resourceId.

methods.name: initialResourceValuesPutDeviceValueIfNotExists
methods.description: Sets an initial device resource value only if it does not already exist.

methods.name: initialResourceValuesPutEndpointValue
methods.description: Stores or replaces an initial value for an endpoint resource.

methods.name: initialResourceValuesPutEndpointValueIfNotExists
methods.description: Sets an initial endpoint resource value only if it does not already exist.

methods.name: initialResourceValuesHasDeviceValue
methods.description: Checks if an initial value exists for a given device resource.

methods.name: initialResourceValuesHasEndpointValue
methods.description: Checks if an initial value exists for a given endpoint resource.

methods.name: initialResourceValuesGetDeviceValue
methods.description: Retrieves the initial value for a device resource, which may be NULL.

methods.name: initialResourceValuesGetEndpointValue
methods.description: Retrieves the initial value for an endpoint resource, which may be NULL.

methods.name: initialResourcesValuesLogValues
methods.description: Logs all set initial resource values.
